I DO intend (God willing) to ≈øhew you the freene≈øs of the Grace of God in reference to mens Employments and Sufferings, and therefore have made choice of this Scripture, wherein you have the Parable of certain Labourers in the Vineyard, the Parable is propounded and applyed; propounded from ver≈ø. 1. to ver≈ø. 16. Fir≈øt, The more ≈øerviceable any man or woman is for God, the more they honour God; and the more they honour God, the more will God honour them: when I te≈øtifie of any excellency in God, then I honour God: when God te≈øtifies of any honour in me, then God honours me; as now when God calls me to any ≈øervice, then God te≈øtifies an excellency in me, then God honours me: when a Governour puts any honour upon a common Souldier, he calls him forth to ≈øpecial ≈øervice: ≈øo it is an honour for a man to be ≈øerviceable to God.
